in.teramatrix.flint.driver.util

Class SPUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.util.SPUtils

  • public class SPUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    To store user details in shared preferences. At startup, we will not prompt to user to login if a user is already logged in So this login details will be stored in android shared preferences
    Author:
    Mohsin Khan
    Date:
    16 May 2016

      • clearPreferences

        public void clearPreferences()
        Method flushPreferences() will remove complete data stored in the shared preferences. So it may be happen that application will start as first time.
